questions.question: Which option shows that something is possibly true now?
options: She might be at the office.
She will be at the office.
She must to be at the office.
questions.answer: She might be at the office.

questions.question: Complete the sentence: 'They _____ have missed the bus, that’s why they’re late.'
Which sentence expresses a possibility in the future?
options: We might visit our cousins next weekend.
We must visit our cousins next weekend.
We visited our cousins last weekend.
We will visit our cousins without doubt.
questions.answer: We might visit our cousins next weekend.
